lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Bank Hapoalim chief economist Petahia Bar-Shavit said real growth of wages in 1986 was about 10 pct, following a fall of between 15 and 20 pct in the second half of 1985 when the government's economic stabilisation programme was introduced.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The report echoed warnings last week by Bank of Israel Governor Michael Bruno and the private Bank Hapoalim that higher wages, government overspending and a consumer boom were rekindling inflation.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: But it held up Argentina and Brazil as examples of the perils awaiting countries who did not follow up on stabilization programs.
